name: Peruz
description: '''Peruz''' (1866 in [[Sivas]] – c. 1920 in [[Istanbul]]) also known as '''Peruz Hanım''' or '''Kantocu Peruz''', '''Perviz Hanım''' was an [[Armenians in the Ottoman Empire|Ottoman Armenian]] [[Kanto (music)|kanto]] singer, songwriter. Her family name was '''Terzakyan'''. One of her nicknames was ''Afet-i Devran Peruz''.
